mapper.sql: id, shopId, activityId, name, price, picture, score, description, stock, sale, startTime, endTime, rules, pNum, code, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate, status
mapper.update:
UPDATE cm_activity_BusinessActivicty
shopId = #{map.shopId},
activityId = #{map.activityId},
name = #{map.name},
price = #{map.price},
picture = #{map.picture},
score = #{map.score},
description = #{map.description},
stock = #{map.stock},
sale = #{map.sale},
startTime = #{map.startTime},
endTime = #{map.endTime},
rules = #{map.rules},
pNum = #{map.pNum},
code = #{map.code},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cm_activity_BusinessActivicty
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND shopId like CONCAT('%', #{shopId} , '%')
AND activityId like CONCAT('%', #{activityId} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{name} , '%')
AND price like CONCAT('%', #{price} , '%')
AND picture like CONCAT('%', #{picture} , '%')
AND score like CONCAT('%', #{score} , '%')
AND description like CONCAT('%', #{description} , '%')
AND stock like CONCAT('%', #{stock} , '%')
AND sale like CONCAT('%', #{sale} , '%')
AND startTime like CONCAT('%', #{startTime} , '%')
AND endTime like CONCAT('%', #{endTime} , '%')
AND rules like CONCAT('%', #{rules} , '%')
AND pNum like CONCAT('%', #{pNum} , '%')
AND code like CONCAT('%', #{code} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
